note.p: Death: His house in Red Lion Square, London (06 August 1754)
Burial: The ground of St George the Martyr, Queen Square, London
Education: Brasenose College, Oxford: BA (1701). All Souls' College, Oxford; MA (1705), BMed (1710), DMed (1714). Lincoln's Inn (admitted 1706)
Career: Fellow of All Souls' College, Oxford; Physician, St Bartholomew's Hospital, London (1725-death)
Notes: Proposed by John Dobyns, John Martyn, William Rutty. According to DNB, he was probably born in Hackney, London. He withdrew from the Society in 1730 (CM 14/01/1741).
